name: Earth Empires - Scrolling Menu
description:
This style sheet will force the ingame left menu to scroll with the rest of the page in Earth Empires, while leaving the top bar fixed.

If you would like to make both the left menu and header scroll with the rest of the page, please see this style: style 33820

Play Earth Empires at http://www.earthempires.com - GET FAT AND WIN!
